review_content:
![interview-kickstart-logo](https://coursereport-production.imgix.net/uploads/school/logo/207/original/354224137_673188051486822_5929325485918695243_n.png?w=72&h=72&fit=clamp&dpr=5&q=20) # Interview Kickstart Average Rating4.78 280 Reviews 24 Courses Save Interview Kickstart is a part-time, 12-15 week online career advancement platform that helps tech professionals nail technical interviews at FAANG (Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Netflix, Google) and Tier-1 companies. Interview Kickstart is dedicated to helping tech and product professionals secure their dream jobs with top tech companies. Since 2014, they have trained over 20,000 tech professionals to succeed in the toughest interviews at FAANG companies. The courses at Interview Kickstart are designed by FAANG tech leads and taught by FAANG instructors. They cover 18 tech and product domains, including Machine Learning, Data Science, System Design, and Software development. Interview Kickstart also offers specialized training for career transitions to rapidly growing AI-related tech fields. With a team of 600 seasoned FAANG+ professionals, their instructors provide real-world guidance to help professionals achieve their career goals. To enroll in any Interview Kickstart program, attend their pre-enrollment webinar held daily (except Saturday). During the webinar, prospective students will learn about courses and the market landscape. After attending, a program advisor will connect with prospective students to assist with the admission process. Filter by All ReviewsVerifiedAnonymousOnlineSan JoseAndroid Engineering Interview PreparationBackend Engineering Interview PreparationCybersecurity Interview PreparationData Engineering Interview PreparationData Science Interview PreparationData Structures and Algorithms Interview BootcampEmbedded Software Engineering Interview PreparationEngineering Manager Interview PreparationFront-end Engineering Interview PreparationFull Stack Engineering Interview PreparationiOS Engineering Interview PreparationLEVELUP: Guided interview prep to level up into a Tier-1 companyMachine Learning Interview PreparationMaster Class (Default) Interview CourseProduct Management Interview PreparationSecurity Engineering Interview CourseSite Reliability Engineering Interview PreparationTechnical Program Manager Interview courseTest Engineering Interview Preparation Loading... - ![Mas](https://coursereport-production-herokuapp-com.freetls.fastly.net/assets/user_default-65249012f6ca56d25bea602140bfe28689658f75ea153625b0e0aba7d4c558e4.svg) Mas Khoda • Student • San Jose Verified by GitHub Dec 14, 2023 Overall Experience Instructors Curriculum Job Assistance ### Bad I had a very bad experience!! It is very pricy and there is no clear schedule. It should be more personalized. The instructions can be selected better. Also the customer service was not great. [Report](mailto:hello@coursereport.com?subject=Flagged%3A%20Interview%20Kickstart%20%7C%20Bad%20%7C%20id%3A%2065330) Share Helpful (1) Student Success Advocate of Interview Kickstart Student Experience Team Mar 02, 2025 Hi Mas, We’re truly sorry to hear that your experience didn’t meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback and would love to address your concerns. \- Pricing: Our program is designed with a comprehensive curriculum, industry-expert instructors, and personalized support to ensure real career impact. \- Schedule & Personalization: We provide a structured roadmap, but also offer flexibility to accommodate different learning paces. We’d love to understand how we could have tailored it better for you. \- Instructors: Our mentors are industry leaders from top tech companies, and we continuously refine our faculty selection to maintain high quality. \- Customer Support: We aim to provide prompt and effective assistance, and we’re sorry if your experience didn’t reflect that. We’d like to understand where we fell short to improve. Unfortunately, we’re unable to find your details in our system at the moment. Could you kindly reach out to us at operations@interviewkickstart.com? This will help us better understand your concerns and work with you to find a resolution. We would love the opportunity to assist you further. Warm Regards, Interview Kickstart Team - Kishan Patel Senior Software Engineer • Graduate • Backend Engineering Interview Preparation • San Jose Verified by LinkedIn Dec 03, 2023 Overall Experience Instructors Curriculum Job Assistance ### All you need to prepare for Tech Interviews I was committed to preparing for tech interviews as thoroughly as possible to land my next dream role. I explored a lot of different prep options before deciding on Interview Kickstart and couldn't be happier. In particular, I was looking for support with system design and behavioral interviews. I am blown away by how well-structured and thorough all of IK's content and support is. They have such a complete set of structured content that walks you through understanding everything you nee... I was committed to preparing for tech interviews as thoroughly as possible to land my next dream role. I explored a lot of different prep options before deciding on Interview Kickstart and couldn't be happier. In particular, I was looking for support with system design and behavioral interviews. I am blown away by how well-structured and thorough all of IK's content and support is. They have such a complete set of structured content that walks you through understanding everything you need to know and most importantly mastering the strategies for HOW to ace any question you're given. IK knows the interview process inside and out and is a master at breaking down the underlying strategies, so I loved how I didn't have to waste any time figuring things out on my own and could simply stay extremely focused in my preparation. In addition, the support their team offers is unparalleled. They're always checking in to make sure you have everything you need to succeed and have always gone up and beyond for any special request I've had. IK truly offers such a thorough solution so that you have everything you need in a single place to succeed. I continue to be so impressed by the level of thoughtfulness they've put into designing the curriculum and ensuring every student has the support they need.  Couldn't recommend them more. I recently enrolled in Interview Kickstart, and I’m really impressed with how well their system is structured. The curriculum is thoughtfully designed, breaking down complex topics into manageable steps that build confidence and skills effectively. The instructors are knowledgeable, and the mock interviews are a game-changer for prep. My only gripe is that the pace feels a bit too crammed—there’s so much packed into each session that it can be overwhelming at times. Still, it’s a fantastic program for anyone serious about acing tech interviews!
The pre-recorded technical videos from Omkar are of high quality. Customer support is very responsive. Career transformation manager has a lot of information to share.

I am confident that IK is throwing every resource at its disposal to game up AIML skills of candidates including onboarding great trainers, career coaches and beyond to help get candidates learn the concepts both breadth and depth wise according to their needs. Snehil provided me great honest feedback on my resume on what is needed to be viewed by companies to short list candidates based on the JD.

I'm using IK to help me get back into job searching shape. Having been a while since I actively searched for a new job. I needed to make sure I was preparing efficiently. IK has absolutely helped guide me to get ready for the interview process. It is a rigorous and sometimes humbling process, but it will get you ready for your next job.See more

#### Written by the company

Interview Kickstart is a part-time, 12-15 week online interview training platform that helps software engineers nail technical interviews at FAANG (Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Netflix, Google) and Tier-1 companies. Interview Kickstart helps students strengthen their programming fundamentals and become better engineers in the process, thereby equipping them with the right set of skills required to crack tough technical interviews at top companies.

Based on a student’s career path, they can choose from 18 different domain-specific courses.
The course curriculum covers Data Structures and Algorithms, Distributed Systems, Design, Domain-Specific Concepts, and Behavioral Interviews. Students will receive support with optimizing their LinkedIn profile and leveraging LinkedIn to land FAANG interviews.

Interview Kickstart gives students expert support with salary negotiation to land bigger and more lucrative offers, mock interviews with industry experts and FAANG hiring managers, one-on-one mentor sessions with technical leads and hiring managers from FAANG companies, and 18 domain courses that specialize in the highest-paying domains.

The highlight of Interview Kickstart’s program is the technical interview prep. Interview Kickstart’s team of 500+ instructors are hiring managers, technical leads, and hiring committee members at FAANG and Tier-1 companies. Being closely acquainted with the hiring process at top tech companies, these instructors know precisely what recruiters are looking for while hiring candidates. This gives students an edge and sets them up for success at highly competitive and challenging technical interviews at FAANG+ companies.

After course completion, Interview Kickstart students receive an extended 6-month support period. During the support period, students can retake classes, schedule mock interviews with domain experts, have one-on-one sessions with instructors from FAANG companies, get support with optimizing their LinkedIn profile and resume, and land interviews through Interview Kickstart’s wide network of alums.

Since 2014, Interview Kickstart has trained over 13,500 engineers for the toughest tech interviews. Interview Kickstart alums receive multiple lucrative offers from top companies, including FAANG, Microsoft, Uber, Lyft, LinkedIn, Twitter, VMware, and more. In 2021, Interview Kickstart graduates received an average salary increase of 53%. See more

The pre-recorded technical videos from…

The pre-recorded technical videos from Omkar are of high quality. Customer support is very responsive. Career transformation manager has a lot of information to share.

I recently enrolled in Interview…

I recently enrolled in Interview Kickstart, and I’m really impressed with how well their system is structured. The curriculum is thoughtfully designed, breaking down complex topics into manageable steps that build confidence and skills effectively. The instructors are knowledgeable, and the mock interviews are a game-changer for prep. My only gripe is that the pace feels a bit too crammed—there’s so much packed into each session that it can be overwhelming at times. Still, it’s a fantastic program for anyone serious about acing tech interviews!

Snehil provided me great honest feedback on my resume on what is needed to be viewed by companies to short list candidates based on the JD.
It was excellent!

Intense and thorough interview preperation

I'm using IK to help me get back into job searching shape. Having been a while since I actively searched for a new job. I needed to make sure I was preparing efficiently. IK has absolutely helped guide me to get ready for the interview process. It is a rigorous and sometimes humbling process, but it will get you ready for your next job.

Interview Kickstart has been my guiding…

Interview Kickstart has been my guiding force in stepping up my career toward data science. I am midway through my year-long course, and the structured curriculum, well-paced assignments, and insightful reviews have been instrumental in my learning journey. I especially look forward to the Sunday live classes, where the instructors are not only knowledgeable but also deeply committed to teaching.

The pause periods, mini and capstone projects, and the quick-responsive student support coordinators enhance the experience, while the Uplevel platform provides an extra edge. Altogether, Interview Kickstart feels like the perfect recipe for career success

I'm taking the Interview Kickstart ML…

I'm taking the Interview Kickstart ML program. The program is very thorough. Surprisingly, the program accommodates varying backgrounds of varying expertise. The program is well-paced and we cover all the key topics of AI/ML what practical hands-on experience. The instructors are ALL actually leaders in tech companies; they are not professors or academics. I truly recommend this program.

The course was great and structured

The course was great and structured. I really benefited from lessons. The instructors were very helpful. The mock interview was great way to boost the confidence before the interviews.

Positive learning experience with IK

The operations team at Interview Kickstart has been incredibly supportive throughout my ongoing machine learning course. Their prompt assistance and dedication make the learning experience seamless and enjoyable. I highly recommend their courses to anyone looking to advance their skills.

Best Experience
